authenticationRequestExtraParams.description: The query parameters to include in the redirect request to the authorization endpoint. Max: 10.

onUnauthenticatedRequest.description: The behavior if the user is not authenticated. Valid values: `deny`, `allow` and `authenticate`

scope.description: The set of user claims to be requested from the IdP.

sessionCookieName.description: The name of the cookie used to maintain session information.

sessionTimeout.description: The maximum duration of the authentication session, in seconds.

userPoolArn.description: The ARN of the Cognito user pool.

userPoolClientId.description: The ID of the Cognito user pool client.

userPoolDomain.description: The domain prefix or fully-qualified domain name of the Cognito user pool.
